Body: If you want to read Arabic the first rule is to forget about google translate. It is useless. الموقع is Arabic for “the place”, here in the sense “site”. فايلات is the English word “file” with the Arabic plural ending –āt. The last word is the brand name “Excel” written in Arabic script. Syntactically, fāylāt eksel is a possessive phrase (ʼiḍāfa), literally “files of Excel”. This phrase is in apposition (badal) to al-mawqiʽ.
